DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : 1 ) To evaluate efficacy feasibility SMS reminder intervention promote health-related exercise programme ( myPAtHS ) among old Malaysian adult , randomize control trial ( RCT ) . Hypothesis : Frequency duration exercise programme execution high SMS reminder condition compare programme condition . The effect may reduce post- follow-up measurement ( 24 week baseline 12 week post-measurement ) outcomes remain significantly high 24 week .
DOC.brief_title: SMS Reminders Exercise Among Older Adults . Malaysian Physical Activity Health Study
DOC.criteria: Mobile phone user Acceptable health prevent exercise Acceptable command English language No engagement regular structure exercise routine like gym training structure programmes Interest exercise programme Willing attend schedule followup session 12 week ( prepost evaluation ) 24 week ( postintervention evaluation ) first session participant medical condition health concern would restrict regular exercise base one screen question . If question answer `` yes '' participant advise seek medical care .
